document_data.mainbody:
PaiNa was a spider-worshiping druid who lived beneath the city of Athkatla during the midâ€“14 century DR.
PaiNa dwelled within a massive spider nest that she had built with the tomb complex beneath the citys Grave District. She was protected by a number of giant spiders, including a wraith spider and a sword spider.
Within her lair, PaiNa kept a number of human bodies that were filled with spiders. At her command the spiders would burst forth and swarm at her direction.
She was in the possession of an ovoid, pale green ioun stone and the black spider figurine that allowed foe summoning forth a semi-intelligent spider named Kitthix.
